mapper.update: UPDATE tb_account_player SET exp = exp + #{addExp}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = now(), level = (SELECT MAX(level) FROM tb_player_level_exp WHERE need_exp <= exp) WHERE id = #{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE tb_account_player SET exp = exp + #{item.addExp}, update_by = #{item.updateBy}, update_time = now(), level = (SELECT MAX(level) FROM tb_player_level_exp WHERE need_exp <= exp) WHERE id = #{item.id}

mapper.select: select tb.account_id account_id, tb.nickname, tb.id, tple.level, tple.need_exp, tple.hp, tple.attack, tple.defender, tple.flee, tple.combo, tple.hit, tple.create_by, tple.create_time, tple.update_by, tple.update_time, tple.del_flag, tw.id tw_id, tw.name, tw.intro, tw.type, tw.grade, tw.min_damage, tw.max_damage from tb_account_player tb left join tb_player_level_exp tple on tple.level = tb.level left join tb_account ac on ac.id = tb.account_id left join tb_player_weapon pw on tb.id = pw.player_id left join tb_weapon tw on pw.weapon_id = tw.id where tb.del_flag = false and (tb.id = #{accountPlayerId} or ac.mac = #{mac})

select ap.id, ap.account_id, ap.nickname, ap.level, tb.region, tb.mac, ap.exp, ap.energy, ple.need_exp from tb_account tb left join tb_account_player ap on ap.account_id = tb.id left join tb_player_level_exp ple on ple.level = ap.level + 1 order by tb.level desc ,tb.exp desc

select tb.id, tb.level, get_weapon, tw.id tw_id, tw.name, tw.intro, tw.min_damage, tw.max_damage from tb_account_player tb left join tb_player_level_exp ple on tb.level = ple.level left join tb_player_weapon tpw on tb.id = tpw.player_id left join tb_weapon tw on tw.id = ple.get_weapon and tpw.weapon_id != tpw.player_id where tb.id in #{id}
